title: Everglades National Park: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan a Field Trip      The vibrant, dynamic Everglades ecosystem provides the perfect outdoor classroom for field studies. Educators have several options for bringing students for a visit to the park.   Local 4th, 5th, and 6th grade students can participate in one of our curriculum-based ranger-guided programs. Teachers, you can also easily  lead your own field trip.       Students on field trip to the Everglades. NPS Photo.            If you have an educational group that does not meet the criteria for the 4th, 5th and 6th grade ranger-guided programs, then you can apply for a special request program. This is subject to ranger staffing and availability.
